::Rex/Firearm::

Rex swears when he sees the two others (Battera and Hakibuscon) arrive, 
ducking down and pressing a few buttons on his wrist comp, ordering the 
defences not to fire on the two. He looks at Shockaract, firing another shot 
at him from his heavy-fire rifle.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Firearm grins at Battera. "How about 'kill him'?" he says, firing his arm 
cannon at Shockaract, the cannon set on heavy-fire.
